text: Bottega Veneta () is an Italian luxury fashion house. They are based in Milan, Italy. They make clothing, handbags, shoes, accessories, jewelry and fragrances. Bottega Veneta is headquartered in Milan, Italy. In 2023, Bottega Veneta's revenue reached 1.6 billion euros. Bottega Veneta was founded in 1966 in Vicenza by Michele Taddei and Renzo Zengiaro. ==References== Category:1966 establishments in Europe Category:1960s establishments in Italy Category:Italian fashion houses Category:Companies based in Milan
title: Bottega Veneta
